meanings.definition: A unit of luminance equal to one lumen per square foot.
meanings.sent1: The room was well-lit with a measurement of footlambert.
meanings.sent2: The footlambert of the screen made it easy to read the text.
meanings.sent3: The footlambert on the wall seemed to wink at me in the dim light.
meanings.sent4: Her smile had a footlambert that brightened up the whole room.
meanings.sent5: The footlambert of the stars in the night sky was breathtaking.

meanings.definition: The brightness of a surface that emits or reflects one lumen per square foot.
meanings.sent1: The footlambert of the lamp made the room cozy.
meanings.sent2: The footlambert of the moonlight illuminated the path.
meanings.sent3: The footlambert of the disco ball added a fun vibe to the party.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes sparkled with a footlambert that captivated everyone.
meanings.sent5: The footlambert of the fireflies created a magical atmosphere.
